Great Commission Catalysts stand ready to serve N.C. Baptist churches, pastors and associational mission strategists with ministry needs that arise.

Staff Directory

We are committed to resourcing the church.

Give

Every gift makes the missions and ministries of North Carolina Baptist possible.

Beliefs

Our beliefs reflect the scriptural truths presented in the Baptist Faith and Message 2000.
